name: Espionage (Renderererer)
description:
You are an unnamed ninja tasked with obtaining plans from a nearby samurai camp.  Pass through the camp, acquire the plans and escape while remaining undetected.

You have 6 shurikens which you can use to temporarily stun a samurai. Use them wisely.

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys

Throw Shuriken:  C

Quit Game: Esc

Please leave some feedback if you have time!

Originally, this game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 but due to some obscure build errors, I was unable to submit my game on time (unless it can still be considered? ;) ).  The game is still in the same state as it was before the EC Jam deadline. The only difference was that I adjusted/removed a few colliders to make it build successfully.

I attempted challenges Extra Historian, Extra Distance and Extra Retro from the EC Game Jam #6.

All assets were made by me during the duration of the Jam. The scripts borrow some code from the Unity tutorial Ruby's Adventure 2D.

This is my first completed/published game. I hope you like it !

P.S. I didn't have time for sound. I'll try to add it soon.
